Shadow Legacy will reveal the history of a lost people on April 10 Brave browser became popular among European iPhone users after iOS 17.4 update Vampire survival V Rising will burst out of the early access coffin in two months – release date and stylish trailer with Dracula Akira ransomware went undetected on Stanford University systems for more than four months TECH NEWS SPACE The Tech News Space team monitors news from the world of high technology, science, the gaming industry and delivers them to its readers in a timely manner. The first ASML lithography scanner was installed to produce 2nm chips using Low-NA EUV technology Somewhat overlooked in the context of recent advances between Intel and ASML is the fact that chipmakers hope to master 2nm production without switching to the use of more expensive EUV high-numerical aperture (High-NA) scanners. It is expected that this scanner will be able to process about 220 silicon wafers per hour versus the previous 160 pieces, justifying its high price with adequate performance, because the equipment for EUV lithography of the previous generation, to put it mildly, was not very fast.  This equipment, according to AnandTechis characterized by a Low Numerical Aperture (Low-NA) value of 0.33, but compared to the previous generation of ASML lithography scanners, it offers increased productivity and a more reasonable cost compared to high NA scanners. ', 'score': 0.7673263549804688}]
column3: [{'url': 'https://www.globalvillagespace.com/tech/salesforce-introduces-the-pro-suite-to-expand-its-presence-in-the-smb-market/', 'published date': 'Wed, 13 Mar 2024 04:22:05 GMT', 'title': "Salesforce introduces the 'Pro Suite' to expand its presence in the SMB market - Global Village space", 'content': 'Salesforce introduces the ‘Pro Suite’ to expand its presence in the SMB market Salesforce, one of the leading customer relationship management (CRM) companies, is expanding its presence in the small and medium-sized business (SMB) market with the launch of its “Pro Suite” offering. According to Kris Billmaier, SVP and GM of self-service and growth at Salesforce, many customers have already upgraded from the Starter Suite to the Pro Suite due to the need for customization and advanced features. The Pro Suite unlocks additional capabilities across marketing, sales, service, and commerce, as well as access to AppExchange solutions, process automation with Flow, a dedicated sandbox for testing and training, and support for custom apps and objects. With its advanced features, customizable options, and AI capabilities, the Pro Suite provides SMBs with the tools they need to streamline their business workflows and drive growth. While both the Starter and Pro Suites currently offer basic predictive AI features like Einstein Activity Capture and Send Time Optimization, Salesforce plans to introduce more advanced generative AI capabilities with Einstein Copilot in the future.', 'score': 0.7901778221130371}, {'url': 'https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2024-03-11/oracle-sales-beat-estimates-as-cloud-growth-stabilizes', 'published date': 'Mon, 11 Mar 2024 20:22:37 GMT', 'title': 'Oracle Sales Beat Estimates as Cloud Growth Stabilizes - Bloomberg', 'content': 'Bloomberg Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world For Customers Support Americas+1 212 318 2000 EMEA+44 20 7330 7500 Asia Pacific+65 6212 1000 Company Communications Follow Products Industry Products Media Media Services Company Communications Follow Products Industry Products Media Media Services Bloomberg Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world For Customers Support Americas+1 212 318 2000 EMEA+44 20 7330 7500 Asia Pacific+65 6212 1000 Oracle Jumps as ‘Large’ New Cloud Contracts Spur Revenue Growth Oracle headquarter in Redwood Shores, California.  Oracle Corp. surged 11% after signaling that growth in its closely watched cloud computing business is stabilizing, showing progress in its bid to capture more market share in the competitive market.  Cloud revenue jumped 25% to $5.1 billion in the period that ended in February, the company said Monday in a statementBloomberg Terminal, surpassing Wall Street’s $5.06 billion estimate. Of that, $1.8 billion came from renting out computing power and storage over the internet and $3.3 billion from applications.', 'score': 0.766682505607605}, {'url': 'https://www.investors.com/market-trend/the-big-picture/stock-market-nasdaq-dow-jones-sp500-oracle-earnings/', 'published date': 'Tue, 12 Mar 2024 22:38:00 GMT', 'title': "Stock Market Takes Inflation Data In Stride; Nasdaq Pops 1.5%, Helped By Oracle Earnings - Investor's Business Daily", 'content': "3:40 PM ET Oracle and Nvidia led a big-tech rally, with Microsoft and... column2: Elevate Your Email Marketing with AI Personalization
column3: Elevate Your Email Marketing with Salesforce's AI Revolution

column2:
Dear Terry Reynolds,

In today's rapidly evolving digital world, staying ahead means leveraging the latest innovations to connect with your audience on a deeper level. That's where our AI-powered email generator comes into play, offering a transformative approach to email marketing. 

Imagine a tool so refined, it tailors each message to the individual recipient based on sophisticated AI analysis. In an era where capturing attention is paramount, our solution ensures your message is not just heard, but truly resonates.

This is more than just keeping pace; it's about leading the way. Just as Nvidia has revolutionized industries from AI to gaming with its pioneering spirit, we invite you to set a new benchmark in email marketing. Our tool is crafted for visionaries like you at Nvidia.net, who recognize the significance of personal connection in digital communication.

Inspired by Nvidia's trailblazing achievements, from semiconductor advancements to AI-driven gaming breakthroughs, our email generator exemplifies the synergy of technology and creativity.

We're motivated by Nvidia's dedication to innovation, and we're excited to offer you the chance to explore our product. Together, let's shape the future of email marketing, creating campaigns that not only capture attention but also inspire action.

Best regards,

Omer Nauer
Marketing Specialist, Streak
omer.n99@gmail.com
column3:
Dear Omer,

I hope this finds you well! At Salesforce, we're constantly seeking ways to empower businesses like Streak with innovative solutions. It's why I'm thrilled to introduce our latest breakthrough: an AI-powered mass email generator designed to revolutionize how you connect with your audience.

This tool stands to transform your marketing strategy by offering unparalleled personalization. Each email can be tailored to match the unique interests and behaviors of its recipient, eliminating the need for manual effort and significantly enhancing engagement.

What makes me so confident in its potential for Streak? Our newly launched 'Pro Suite' caters specifically to SMBs, offering advanced features and customizable options that include the future integration of Einstein Copilot's generative AI capabilities. This suite is crafted to bolster your efforts across marketing, sales, service, and commerce, fueling growth with the right tools. (Discover more about this innovative leap here: https://www.globalvillagespace.com/tech/salesforce-introduces-the-pro-suite-to-expand-its-presence-in-the-smb-market/)

In today's digital-first world, staying ahead means leveraging the latest in cloud and AI technology. Our new product positions Streak to not just keep pace but to lead the market by delivering exceptional, personalized customer experiences.

I'm eager to explore how this solution can seamlessly integrate with Streak's systems, enhancing both growth and customer engagement. Can we schedule a time to discuss how Salesforce can tailor this to fit your unique needs?

Warm regards,
Michael Davis
Marketing Coordinator, Salesforce
michaeld@salesforce.com

P.S. The future of advanced AI is here. Let's embrace it together to redefine how you engage with your customers.

column2: The revised email focuses on making the message more concise and directly relevant to the recipient, Terry Reynolds, and their potential interests. It removes overly broad and somewhat irrelevant references to Nvidia's activities that are not directly related to the product being offered, such as semiconductor production in Thailand, to maintain the recipient's focus. The language has been simplified for clearer communication, emphasizing the benefits and innovative aspects of the AI-powered email generator. This edit aims to enhance engagement by directly addressing the recipient's potential needs and interests in email marketing personalization, without diluting the message with broad or off-topic references.
column3: The revised email focuses on a more conversational and engaging tone to better connect with the recipient, Omer. Specific changes include: 1) Streamlining the introduction to immediately highlight the value proposition of the AI-powered mass email generator. 2) Replacing 'Imagine the impact' with direct statements to assert the benefits confidently. 3) Clarifying the relevance of the 'Pro Suite' to Streak's needs and emphasizing its customization options. 4) Reframing the comparison with Oracle to focus solely on Salesforce's offering and its benefits for Streak. 5) Including a direct call to action inviting Omer to discuss the integration and customization possibilities. These edits aim to make the email more personalized, succinct, and focused on the recipient's potential gains from the partnership.
